# Virtue (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[0 Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 0]], [[0 Level Druid Spells|Druid 0]], [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 365

With a touch, you infuse a creature with a tiny surge of life, granting the subject 1 temporary hit point.
